Mouse Cursor Constant List


This is a list of mouse cursor constants starting with "cr". Some of these may change depending on Windows settings.

crDefault : Same as crArrow
crNone : Transparent (Hidden)
crArrow :
crCross :
crIBeam :
crSizeNESW :
crSizeNS :
crSizeNWSE :
crSizeWE :
crUpArrow :
crHourGlass :
crNo :
crHelp :
crHandPoint :
crSizeAll :
